Back To Bazic Our Goal Is To Provide Each Customer With Long-Lasting Supplies At An Affordable Cost. Since 1998, We’Ve Delivered On This Promise And Will Only Continue To Improve Every Year. We’Ve Built Our Brand On Integrity And Quality, So Customers Know Exactly What To Expect. Committed To Values We Are A Value-Driven Company, Guided By The Principles Of Excellence Through Strong Product Design At Low Cost. Our Commitment To These Values Is Reflected In Our Dedication To Improving Current Products And Developing New Exciting Products For Our Consumers. Ideal Supplies Our Currency Is Ideas. We Thrive On Imagination, Passion And Leadership. We Have Great Products And Will To Continue To Rise With Our Customer Expectations.While Our Supplies Are Sourced From All Across The World, Our Success Stems From Individual Consumer Fulfillment. We Create Products That People Want To Recommend To Others.
ASSORTED DIMENSIONS MULTICOLOR RUBBER BANDS. A variety of different colors and sizes make these rubber bands great for house, office and school projects. From craft projects, to organizing your materials, BAZIC has you covered.
BAND TOGETHER. These multi colored rubber bands offer a variety of sizes and shapes for all your binding needs. They are perfect for practical everyday use or even for more creative ideas like rubber band balls or tie dying shirts.
REPUTATION + RELIABILITY. BAZIC Products has been offering uncompromised quality in school and office products since 1998. Dedicated to continuous improvement, we are proud to be an ongoing industry-leader.
SOLD & DISTRIBUTED IN THE USA. Working with trusted factories, we ensure our products are up to the highest standard before sending to customers. Each item is shipped out of our headquarters in Los Angeles, never leaving until we’re satisfied with our product integrity.

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:35:29 UTC – Details)

Product Description

ABOUT GIANTISAN

GIANTISAN consistently provides more innovative, stronger and exquisite tools to improve our world.

GIANTISAN consists of the word Giant and Artisan, believing in that everyone can be a giant of a artisan with the right tools to equip themselves.

About GT607

The 16″ newly produced rivet nut tool is an integration of several latest design concepts- simple using, effort saving, high reliability and comfortability of ergonomic design. Its design and long arm enable you to save 50% effort than normal rivet nut tool and experience a more comfortable way of work.

FEATURES & BENEFITS

Quick Chinging Mandrels

The kit offer as much as 12 sizes of mandrels and rivet nuts, however it is very simple to exchanging different mandrels by hand.

Easy To Operate

It makes riveting work so easy by just 3-4 simple steps.

Long Lasting & Durable

Made from thick carbon steel with heat treated, and black phosphating finishing protects against corrosion. U cross-section of arm is of high reliability to prevent getting bent. It is sturdy and durable enough for long life performance.

Organized Storage Solution

Solid case with organized space for storage and protection of the tool and all accessories.

PRODUCT INCLUDES:

1 x 16”Hand Rivet Nut Tool7 x Metric and 5 x SAE Mandrels176 x Rivet Nuts in Storage Case1 x Versatile Spanner1 x Detailed User Manual1 x Rugged Tool Case

WARM TIPS:

The tool is capable of over setting small rivnut as M3,M4 and 10-24 etc. When setting small rivnut, please apply less power on the handles and the arms of the tool do not need to come very close to each other, or the small mandrel can be damaged.The mandrels are consumable. Frequent or improper use would consume the useful life of them, and even damage them. The mandrels and replacements which are universal can be easily found in Amazon.Please be noted that the M8 mandrel are already installed on the tool, so the small box of M8 is empty.

INNOVATIVE MECHANISM – Toolless operation to change head. The Inner threaded base & hex sleeve firmly lock the mandrel during riveting.
STRONG AND DURABLE – The 16″ rivet nut tool is made from thick carbon steel with heat treated, and black phosphating finishing protects against corrosion. U cross-section of arm is of high reliability to prevent getting bent. With designed structure and tough materiels it is sturdy and durable enough for long life performance.
VARIOUS USE-CASE SCENARIOS – It provide professional solution for all kinds of riveting cases as metal plate, riveting workpiece, bicycle attachments, car attachments etc.
ORGANIZED STORAGE SOLUTION – A rivnut tool, 12 interchangable mandrels including M3 M4 M5 M6 M8 M10 M12 10-24 1/4-20 3/8-16 5/16-18 1/2-13, 176pcs rivnuts, a spanner, a storage case keep all rivet nuts, a detailed user manual, and a rugged carrying case to keep all of them organized.
WARRANTY AND SERVICE – Incase you are not satisfied with this product for any reason, or you have any question please feel free to contact us, we are ready to service you any time.

ABOUT GIANTISAN

GIANTISAN consistently provides more innovative, stronger and exquisite tools to improve our world.

GIANTISAN consists of the word Giant and Artisan, believing in that everyone can be a giant of a artisan with the right tools to equip themselves.

About GT607

The 16″ newly produced rivet nut tool is an integration of several latest design concepts- simple using, effort saving, high reliability and comfortability of ergonomic design. Its design and long arm enable you to save 50% effort than normal rivet nut tool and experience a more comfortable way of work.

FEATURES & BENEFITS

Quick Chinging Mandrels

The kit offer as much as 12 sizes of mandrels and rivet nuts, however it is very simple to exchanging different mandrels by hand.

Easy To Operate

It makes riveting work so easy by just 3-4 simple steps.

Long Lasting & Durable

Made from thick carbon steel with heat treated, and black phosphating finishing protects against corrosion. U cross-section of arm is of high reliability to prevent getting bent. It is sturdy and durable enough for long life performance.

Organized Storage Solution

Solid case with organized space for storage and protection of the tool and all accessories.

Read more

PRODUCT INCLUDES:

  • 1 x 16”Hand Rivet Nut Tool
  • 7 x Metric and 5 x SAE Mandrels
  • 176 x Rivet Nuts in Storage Case
  • 1 x Versatile Spanner
  • 1 x Detailed User Manual
  • 1 x Rugged Tool Case

WARM TIPS:

  • The tool is capable of over setting small rivnut as M3,M4 and 10-24 etc. When setting small rivnut, please apply less power on the handles and the arms of the tool do not need to come very close to each other, or the small mandrel can be damaged.
  • The mandrels are consumable. Frequent or improper use would consume the useful life of them, and even damage them. The mandrels and replacements which are universal can be easily found in Amazon.
  • Please be noted that the M8 mandrel are already installed on the tool, so the small box of M8 is empty.

4.5
Price: $82.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:35:29 UTC – Details)
